com.turnout.ws.service

Interface OffersService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffersServiceImpl

    public interface OffersService

    • Method Detail

      • getActiveOffers

        org.json.simple.JSONObject getActiveOffers(java.lang.String beaconId,
                                         java.lang.String type)
        Get active offers based on beacon id and type of the offer.
        Parameters:
        beaconId - an unique string mapped with studio.
        type - welcome or exit type offer.
        Returns:
        return all active offers mapped with studio.

      • saveOffers

        org.json.simple.JSONObject saveOffers(int ofrId,
                                    int ofrStdId,
                                    java.lang.String ofrType,
                                    java.lang.String ofrStatus,
                                    java.lang.String ofrImg,
                                    java.lang.String ofrDescription,
                                    java.lang.String ofrExternalLink,
                                    java.util.Date ofrCreatedDate)
        Used to store the offers into table. It will return (primary key) offer id.
        Parameters:
        ofrId - the primary key of offers.
        ofrStdId - the primary key of studio.
        ofrType - welcome or exit type offer.
        ofrStatus - active or inactive status.
        ofrImg - offer image.
        ofrDescription - description about the offer.
        ofrExternalLink - external link.
        ofrCreatedDate - offer created date.
        Returns:
        return offer id.

      • offerSearch

        org.json.simple.JSONArray offerSearch(java.lang.String ofrname)
        This method used to get all the offers from database and helps to search the offers based on offer name passed string.
        Parameters:
        ofrname - name of the offer that has to be searched.
        Returns:
        eturns JSONArray contains all the results after searching is done.

      • offerDetails

        org.json.simple.JSONObject offerDetails(int ofrId)
        used to get offer details based on the offer id pass.
        Parameters:
        ofrId - the primary key offer.
        Returns:
        return full details about offers.
